scopevar.name: savemapping
scopevar.help: savemapping=false|true -  Specifies whether the generated Hibernate mapping file has to be saved to disc. If you set the value to true, the Hibernate mapping XML file is saved with the filename "CFC name".hbmxml in the same directory as the CFC.

scopevar.name: schema
scopevar.help: Specifies the default Schema that should be used by ORM.

scopevar.name: secondarycacheenabled
scopevar.help: secondarycacheenabled=true|false - Specifies whether secondary caching should be enabled.

scopevar.name: sqlscript
scopevar.help: Path to the SQL script file that gets executed after ORM is initialized. This applies if dbcreate is set to dropcreate. This must be the absolute file path or the path relative to the application.The SQL script file lets you populate the tables before the application is accessed.

scopevar.name: useDBForMapping
scopevar.help: useDBForMapping=true|false - Specifies whether the database has to be inspected to identify the missing information required to generate the Hibernate mapping. The database is inspected to get the column data type, primary key and foreign key information.

scopevar.name: skipCFCWithError
scopevar.help: skipCFCWithError=true|false - Lets you specify if ColdFusion must skip the CFCs that have errors. If set to true, ColdFusion ignores the CFCs that have errors.

scopevar.name: autoManageSession
scopevar.help: autoManageSession=true|false - Lets you specify if ColdFusion must manage Hibernate session automatically.

autogenmap.name: autogenmap
autogenmap.help: autogenmap=true|false - Specifies whether ColdFusion should automatically generate mapping for the persistent CFCs. If autogenmap=false, mapping should be provided in the form of .HBMXML files.

cacheconfig.name: cacheconfig
cacheconfig.help: Specifies the location of the configuration file that should be used by the secondary cache provider.This setting is used only when secondarycacheenabled=true.

cacheprovider.name: cacheprovider
cacheprovider.help: Specifies the cache provider that should be used by ORM as secondary cache. The values can be: 						    * Ehcache 						    * JBossCache 						    * Hashtable 						    * SwarmCache 						    * OSCache  Fully qualified name of the class for any other cache provider.  This setting is used only when secondarycacheenabled=true

catalog.name: catalog
catalog.help: Specifies the default Catalog that should be used by ORM.

cfclocation.name: cfclocation
cfclocation.help: Specifies the directory (or array of directories) that should be used by ColdFusion to search for persistent CFCs to generate the mapping. If cfclocation is set, ColdFusion looks at only the paths specified in it. If it is not set, ColdFusion looks at the application directory, its sub-directories, and its mapped directories to search for persistent CFCs.

datasource.name: datasource
datasource.help: Specifies the data source that should be used by ORM. If it is not specified here, then the data source specified for the application is picked up.

dbcreate.name: dbcreate
dbcreate.help: ColdFusion ORM can automatically create the tables for your application in the database when ORM is initialized for the application. This can be enabled by using dbcreate in ormsettings. dbCreate takes the following values: 						    * update: Setting this value creates the table if it does not exist or update the table if it exists. * dropcreate: Setting this value drops the table if it exists and then creates it. * none (default): Setting this value does not change anything in the database schema.

eventhandling.name: eventHandling
eventhandling.help: eventHandling=true|false - Specifies whether ORM Event callbacks should be given.

flushatrequestend.name: flushatrequestend
flushatrequestend.help: flushatrequestend=true|false - Specifies whether ormflush should be called automatically at request end. If flushatrequestend is false, ormflush is not called automatically at request end.

logsql.name: logSQL
logsql.help: logSQL=true|false - Specifies whether the SQL queries that are executed by ORM will be logged. If LogSQL=true, the SQL queries are logged to the console.

savemapping.name: savemapping
savemapping.help: savemapping=false|true -  Specifies whether the generated Hibernate mapping file has to be saved to disc. If you set the value to true, the Hibernate mapping XML file is saved with the filename "CFC name".hbmxml in the same directory as the CFC.

schema.name: schema
schema.help: Specifies the default Schema that should be used by ORM.

secondarycacheenabled.name: secondarycacheenabled
secondarycacheenabled.help: secondarycacheenabled=true|false - Specifies whether secondary caching should be enabled.

sqlscript.name: sqlscript
sqlscript.help: Path to the SQL script file that gets executed after ORM is initialized. This applies if dbcreate is set to dropcreate. This must be the absolute file path or the path relative to the application.The SQL script file lets you populate the tables before the application is accessed.

usedbformapping.name: useDBForMapping
usedbformapping.help: useDBForMapping=true|false - Specifies whether the database has to be inspected to identify the missing information required to generate the Hibernate mapping. The database is inspected to get the column data type, primary key and foreign key information.

skipcfcwitherror.name: skipCFCWithError
skipcfcwitherror.help: skipCFCWithError=true|false - Lets you specify if ColdFusion must skip the CFCs that have errors. If set to true, ColdFusion ignores the CFCs that have errors.

automanagesession.name: autoManageSession
automanagesession.help: autoManageSession=true|false - Lets you specify if ColdFusion must manage Hibernate session automatically.

scopevar.name: datasource
scopevar.help: Name of the data source from which the query retrieves data.

scopevar.name: enableRobustException
scopevar.help: Overrides the default administrator settings. It does not report compile-time exceptions.

scopevar.name: debuggingIPAddress
scopevar.help: A list of ip addresses that need debugging.

scopevar.name: smtpServerSettings
scopevar.help: A struct that contains the following values: server, username, and password.If no value is specified, takes the value in the administrator.

scopevar.name: s3
scopevar.help: A struct to define Amazon S3 storage.

scopevar.name: accessKeyId
scopevar.help: Key Id.

scopevar.name: awsSecretKey
scopevar.help: AWS Secret Key.

scopevar.name: defaultLocation
scopevar.help: Default Location.

scopevar.name: sessioncookie.httponly
scopevar.help: Determines if session cookies to be set as HttpOnly or not. i.e. accessible only to Http requests

scopevar.name: sessioncookie.secure
scopevar.help: Determines if session cookies to be set as secure or not. i.e. returned on any type of connection or only secured ( https) connections

scopevar.name: sessioncookie.timeout
scopevar.help: Cookie age in days

scopevar.name: sessioncookie.domain
scopevar.help: Domain for which the cookie should be set. This should match exactly with the domain, with which application would be accessed

scopevar.name: sessioncookie.disableupdate
scopevar.help: Disables update of session cookie using cfcookie or cfheader tag

scopevar.name: authcookie.timeout
scopevar.help: Authentication cookie age in days

scopevar.name: inmemoryfilesystem.enabled
scopevar.help: Enable Virtual File System for this application

scopevar.name: inmemoryfilesystem.size
scopevar.help: Sets the size of Virtual File System

scopevar.name: invokeimplicitaccessor
scopevar.help: Enable implicit notation e.g. CFCObj.x = 'somevalue

scopevar.name: exchangeserverversion
scopevar.help: Version of Microsoft Exchange version

scopevar.name: ormsettings.searchenabled
scopevar.help: If true, ORM search is enabled

scopevar.name: ormsettings.searchenabled
scopevar.help: If true, ORM search is enabled

scopevar.name: ormsettings.search.autoIndex
scopevar.help: If true, autoindexing is enabled

scopevar.name: ormsettings.search.indexDir
scopevar.help: If specified, creates a folder by entity name in the file system where indexes for all entities are saved. If not specified, creates the folder in the application root directory

scopevar.name: ormsettings.search.language
scopevar.help: The language that is used to index and search. Default is English

scopevar.name: cache
scopevar.help: Struct that defines all cache settings.

scopevar.name: cache.configfile
scopevar.help: Path to ehcache.xml file for application specific cache configuration.

scopevar.name: javaSettings
scopevar.help: Specify paths from where custom Java classes to be loaded

scopevar.name: javaSettings.loadPaths
scopevar.help: Array of paths from where custom Java classes to be loaded

scopevar.name: javaSettings.loadColdFusionClassPath
scopevar.help: Boolean. Indicates whether ColdFusion's class loader should be the parent of this application specific class loader that will be created

scopevar.name: javaSettings.reloadOnChange
scopevar.help: Boolean. If true, jars/classes will be picked up dynamically without a restart of the server

scopevar.name: javaSettings.watchInterval
scopevar.help: Specifies the amount of time in seconds after which the files under the directory or jar files will be monitored for change

scopevar.name: javaSettings.watchExtensions
scopevar.help: Specifies a list of extensions that will be monitored for change when reloadonchange is set to true

scopevar.name: serversideFormValidation
scopevar.help: If no, disables validation on cfform fields when the form is submitted

scopevar.name: restsettings.cflocation
scopevar.help: The location where the scanning of CFC would be done to find all the REST enabled CFCs in an application

scopevar.name: restsettings.skipCFCWithError
scopevar.help: Defines an action to be taken if an error occur when scanning the CFCs. If the true, it skips the error and goes on to scan the next CFC, else the startup of that application fails

scopevar.name: restsettings.autoregister
scopevar.help: Defines if the REST application should be registered and initialized

scopevar.name: customSerializer
scopevar.help: The pluggable serializer/deserializer

scopevar.name: document.usewebkit
scopevar.help: If webkit implementation should be used for CFDocument tag

scopevar.name: security.antisamypolicy
scopevar.help: File path for antisamy policy file

scopevar.name: authcookie.disableupdate
scopevar.help: Disables update of cfauthorization cookie using cfcookie or cfheader tag

scopevar.name: chartStyleDirectory
scopevar.help: Application specific client side charting styles directory

scopevar.name: cache.querysize
scopevar.help: Maximum number of queries to be stored in default query cache region

scopevar.name: wssettings.version.publish
scopevar.help: Specifies which version of the Axis should be used for publishing the WebService. If the wsversion is specified as "1" then Axis 1 is used. If it is "2" then Axis 2 is used

scopevar.name: wssettings.version.consume
scopevar.help: Specifies which version of the Axis should be used for consuming the WebService. If the wsversion is specified as "1" then Axis 1 is used. If it is "2" then Axis 2 is used

scopevar.name: wssettings.style
scopevar.help: Specifies which style for WSDL to be used for publishing the WebService

scopevar.name: wssettings.includeCFTypesInWSDL
scopevar.help: If set to true, will include the schemas for the ColdFusion types such as Struct, QueryBean and Document in the WSDL

scopevar.name: sameformfieldsasarray
scopevar.help: If set to true, values of multiple form fields with same name in Form scope are represented as array, else list.

scopevar.name: onabort
scopevar.help: Path to the template handler when request is aborted, beause of cfabort, cflocation, or cfcontent

scopevar.name: onWSAuthenticate
scopevar.help: Function to authenticate a WebSocket client when it invokes a corresponding client side JS API 'authenticate'.

scopevar.name: wschannels
scopevar.help: Array of struct containing websocket name and handler

scopevar.name: chartStyleDirectory
scopevar.help: Application specific client side charting styles directory. Specify a directory path relative to Application.cfc or an absolute path

scopevar.name: chartStyleDirectory
scopevar.help: Application specific client side charting styles directory. Specify a directory path relative to Application.cfc or an absolute path

scopevar.name: serializeQueryAS
scopevar.help: The format for query to be serialized

scopevar.name: preserveCaseForSerialize
scopevar.help: Boolean. Whether to preserve case of struct keys or not. Default value: true

cfid.name: CFID
cfid.help: Unique client ID. Part of the session key.

cftoken.name: CFToken
cftoken.help: Unique ID. Part of the session key.

lastvisit.name: LastVisit
lastvisit.help: Date and time of the last visit.

timecreated.name: TimeCreated
timecreated.help: Date and time of first visit.

device.cordova.name: device.cordova
device.cordova.help: Version of Cordova running on device

accelerometer.frequency.name: accelerometer.frequency
accelerometer.frequency.help: Frequency to invoke callback with current acceleration (in milliseconds)

events.isplugged.name: events.isPlugged
events.isplugged.help: A boolean that represents whether or not the device is plugged in or not

auth_type.name: AUTH_TYPE
auth_type.help: If the server supports user authentication, and the script is protected, the protocol-specific authentication method used to validate the user.

auth_user.name: AUTH_USER
auth_user.help: If the server supports user authentication, and the script is protected, the username the user has authenticated as. (Also available as AUTH_USER.)

cert_issuer.name: CERT_ISSUER
cert_issuer.help: Information about the authority that provided the client certificate

cert_subject.name: CERT_SUBJECT
cert_subject.help: Client-specific information provided by the web server. This data typically includes the client's name, e-mail address, and so on

content_length.name: CONTENT_LENGTH
content_length.help: Length of the content as given by the client.

content_type.name: CONTENT_TYPE
content_type.help: For queries that have attached information, such as HTTP POST and PUT, this is the content type of the data.

gateway_interface.name: GATEWAY_INTERFACE
gateway_interface.help: CGI specification revision with which this server complies. Format: CGI/revision.

http_referer.name: HTTP_REFERER
http_referer.help: The referring document that linked to or submitted form data.

http_user_agent.name: HTTP_USER_AGENT
http_user_agent.help: The browser that the client is currently using to send the request. Format: software/version library/version.

path_info.name: PATH_INFO
path_info.help: Extra path information, as given by the client.

query_string.name: QUERY_STRING
query_string.help: Query information that follows the ? in the URL that referenced this script.

remote_addr.name: REMOTE_ADDR
remote_addr.help: IP address of the remote host making the request.

remote_host.name: REMOTE_HOST
remote_host.help: Hostname making the request. If the server does not have this information, it sets REMOTE_ADDR and does not set REMOTE_HOST.

remote_user.name: REMOTE_USER
remote_user.help: If the server supports user authentication, and the script is protected, the username the user has authenticated as. (Also available as AUTH_USER.)

request_method.name: REQUEST_METHOD
request_method.help: Method with which the request was made. For HTTP, this is Get, Head, Post, and so on.

script_name.name: SCRIPT_NAME
script_name.help: Virtual path to the script that is executing; used for self-referencing URLs.

server_name.name: SERVER_NAME
server_name.help: Server's hostname, DNS alias, or IP address as it appears in self-referencing URLs.

server_port.name: SERVER_PORT
server_port.help: Port number to which the request was sent.

server_protocol.name: SERVER_PROTOCOL
server_protocol.help: Name and revision of the information protocol this request came in with. Format: protocol/revision.

server_software.name: SERVER_SOFTWARE
server_software.help: Name and version of the information server software answering the request (and running the gateway). Format: name/version.

scopevar.name: ProductName
scopevar.help: ColdFusion product name, usually "ColdFusion Server"

scopevar.name: ProductVersion
scopevar.help: ColdFusion product release information. Comma seperated list of build numbers, first number is the major build number.

scopevar.name: ProductLevel
scopevar.help: ColdFusion product level information, for example: "Enterprise", or "Developer" etc.

scopevar.name: SerialNumber
scopevar.help: ColdFusion serial number.

scopevar.name: SupportedLocales
scopevar.help: Locales supported by ColdFusion server

scopevar.name: AppServer
scopevar.help: Name of J2EE Application server, for stand-alone ColdFusion the value is "JRun4".

scopevar.name: Expiration
scopevar.help: Expiration date of ColdFusion.

scopevar.help: ColdFusion install directory

scopevar.help: Server operating system name

scopevar.name: AdditionalInformation
scopevar.help: Information about the host operating system.

scopevar.help: Operating system version.

scopevar.name: BuildNumber
scopevar.help: Build number of the host operating system.

additionalinformation.help: Information about the host operating system.

buildnumber.name: BuildNumber
buildnumber.help: Build number of the host operating system.

applicationname.help: Name of the application set with the cfapplication tag, or in Application.cfc

cfid.name: CFID
cfid.help: Unique Session ID. Part of the session key.

cftoken.name: CFToken
cftoken.help: Unique ID. Part of the session key.

attemptedserverfile.name: AttemptedServerFile
attemptedserverfile.help: Specifies whether or not ColdFusion attempted to save a file.

clientdirectory.name: ClientDirectory
clientdirectory.help: Full path of the uploaded file on the clients system.

clientfile.name: ClientFile
clientfile.help: Filename of the uploaded file on the clients system.

clientfileext.name: ClientFileExt
clientfileext.help: Extension of the uploaded file on the clients system without a period.

clientfilename.name: ClientFileName
clientfilename.help: Filename without an extension of the uploaded file on the client's system.

contentsubtype.name: ContentSubType
contentsubtype.help: MIME content subtype of the saved file.

contenttype.name: ContentType
contenttype.help: MIME content type of the saved file.

datelastaccessed.name: DateLastAccessed
datelastaccessed.help: Date and time the uploaded file was last accessed.

fileexisted.name: FileExisted
fileexisted.help: Specifies whether or not the file already existed with the same path.

filewasappended.name: FileWasAppended
filewasappended.help: Specifies whether or not ColdFusion appended a file to an existing file.

filewasoverwritten.name: FileWasOverwritten
filewasoverwritten.help: Specifies whether or not ColdFusion overwrote a file.

filewasrenamed.name: FileWasRenamed
filewasrenamed.help: Specifies whether or not the uploaded file was renamed to avoid a name conflict.

filewassaved.name: FileWasSaved
filewassaved.help: Specifies whether or not ColdFusion saved a file.

oldfilesize.name: OldFileSize
oldfilesize.help: Size of a file that was overwritten in the file upload operation.

serverdirectory.name: ServerDirectory
serverdirectory.help: Full path of the file actually saved.

serverfile.name: ServerFile
serverfile.help: Filename of the file actually saved.

serverfileext.name: ServerFileExt
serverfileext.help: Extension of the uploaded file on the server, without a period.

serverfilename.name: ServerFileName
serverfilename.help: Filename, without an extension, of the uploaded file on the server.

timecreated.name: TimeCreated
timecreated.help: Time the uploaded file was created.

timelastmodified.name: TimeLastModified
timelastmodified.help: Date and time of the last modification to the uploaded file.

name.name: name
name.help: The application name. If you do not set this variable, or set it to the empty string, your CFC applies to the unnamed application scope, which is the ColdFusion J2EE servlet context.

applicationtimeout.name: applicationTimeout
applicationtimeout.help: Life span, as a real number of days, of the application, including all Application scope variables. Use the CFML CreateTimeSpan function to generate this variableâ€™s value.

clientmanagement.name: clientManagement
clientmanagement.help: Specifies whether the application supports Client scope variables.

clientstorage.name: clientStorage
clientstorage.help: Specifies where Client variables are stored; can be cookie, registry, or the name of a data source.

loginstorage.name: loginStorage
loginstorage.help: Whether to store login information in the Cookie scope or the Session scope.

mappings.name: mappings
mappings.help: A structure that contains ColdFusion mappings. Each element in the structure consists of a key and a value. The logical path is the key and the absolute path is the value.

sessionmanagement.name: sessionManagement
sessionmanagement.help: Specifies whether the application supports Session scope variables.

sessiontimeout.name: sessionTimeout
sessiontimeout.help: Life span, as a real number of days, of the user session, including all Session variables.

setclientcookies.name: setClientCookies
setclientcookies.help: Specifies whether to send CFID and CFTOKEN cookies to the client browser.

setdomaincookies.name: setDomainCookies
setdomaincookies.help: Specifies whether to set CFID and CFTOKEN cookies for a domain (not just a host).

scriptprotect.name: scriptProtect

securejson.name: secureJSON

inmemoryfilesystem.enabled.name: inmemoryfilesystem.enabled
inmemoryfilesystem.enabled.help: Enable Virtual File System for this application

inmemoryfilesystem.size.name: inmemoryfilesystem.size
inmemoryfilesystem.size.help: Sets the size of Virtual File System

ormsettings.searchenabled.name: ormsettings.searchenabled
ormsettings.searchenabled.help: If true, ORM search is enabled

ormsettings.search.indexdir.name: ormsettings.search.indexDir
ormsettings.search.indexdir.help: If specified, creates a folder by entity name in the file system where indexes for all entities are saved. If not specified, creates the folder in the application root directory

ormsettings.search.language.name: ormsettings.search.language
ormsettings.search.language.help: The language that is used to index and search. Default is English

cache.name: cache
cache.help: Struct that defines all cache settings.

cache.configfile.name: cache.configfile
cache.configfile.help: Path to ehcache.xml file for application specific cache configuration.

javasettings.name: javaSettings
javasettings.help: Specify paths from where custom Java classes to be loaded

javasettings.loadpaths.name: javaSettings.loadPaths
javasettings.loadpaths.help: Array of paths from where custom Java classes to be loaded

javasettings.loadcoldfusionclasspath.name: javaSettings.loadColdFusionClassPath
javasettings.loadcoldfusionclasspath.help: Boolean. Indicates whether ColdFusion's class loader should be the parent of this application specific class loader that will be created

javasettings.reloadonchange.name: javaSettings.reloadOnChange
javasettings.reloadonchange.help: Boolean. If true, jars/classes will be picked up dynamically without a restart of the server

javasettings.watchinterval.name: javaSettings.watchInterval
javasettings.watchinterval.help: Specifies the amount of time in seconds after which the files under the directory or jar files will be monitored for change

javasettings.watchextensions.name: javaSettings.watchExtensions
javasettings.watchextensions.help: Specifies a list of extensions that will be monitored for change when reloadonchange is set to true

serversideformvalidation.name: serversideFormValidation
serversideformvalidation.help: If no, disables validation on cfform fields when the form is submitted

restsettings.cflocation.name: restsettings.cflocation
restsettings.cflocation.help: The location where the scanning of CFC would be done to find all the REST enabled CFCs in an application

restsettings.skipcfcwitherror.name: restsettings.skipCFCWithError
restsettings.skipcfcwitherror.help: Defines an action to be taken if an error occur when scanning the CFCs. If the true, it skips the error and goes on to scan the next CFC, else the startup of that application fails

restsettings.autoregister.name: restsettings.autoregister
restsettings.autoregister.help: Defines if the REST application should be registered and initialized

document.usewebkit.name: document.usewebkit
document.usewebkit.help: If webkit implementation should be used for CFDocument tag

security.antisamypolicy.name: security.antisamypolicy
security.antisamypolicy.help: File path for antisamy policy file

authcookie.disableupdate.name: authcookie.disableupdate
authcookie.disableupdate.help: Disables update of cfauthorization cookie using cfcookie or cfheader tag

chartstyledirectory.name: chartStyleDirectory
chartstyledirectory.help: Application specific client side charting styles directory. Specify a directory path relative to Application.cfc or an absolute path

cache.querysize.name: cache.querysize
cache.querysize.help: Maximum number of queries to be stored in default query cache region

wssettings.version.publish.name: wssettings.version.publish
wssettings.version.publish.help: Specifies which version of the Axis should be used for publishing the WebService. If the wsversion is specified as "1" then Axis 1 is used. If it is "2" then Axis 2 is used

wssettings.version.consume.name: wssettings.version.consume
wssettings.version.consume.help: Specifies which version of the Axis should be used for consuming the WebService. If the wsversion is specified as "1" then Axis 1 is used. If it is "2" then Axis 2 is used

wssettings.style.name: wssettings.style
wssettings.style.help: Specifies which style for WSDL to be used for publishing the WebService

wssettings.includecftypesinwsdl.name: wssettings.includeCFTypesInWSDL
wssettings.includecftypesinwsdl.help: If set to true, will include the schemas for the ColdFusion types such as Struct, QueryBean and Document in the WSDL

sameformfieldsasarray.name: sameformfieldsasarray
sameformfieldsasarray.help: If set to true, values of multiple form fields with same name in Form scope are represented as array, else list.

onabort.name: onabort
onabort.help: Path to the template handler when request is aborted, beause of cfabort, cflocation, or cfcontent

onwsauthenticate.name: onWSAuthenticate
onwsauthenticate.help: Function to authenticate a WebSocket client when it invokes a corresponding client side JS API 'authenticate'.

wschannels.name: wschannels
wschannels.help: Array of struct containing websocket name and handler

serializequeryas.name: serializeQueryAS
serializequeryas.help: The format for query to be serialized

preservecaseforserialize.name: preserveCaseForSerialize
preservecaseforserialize.help: Boolean. Whether to preserve case of struct keys or not. Default value: true
